job.title: Software Engineer
job.description:
Job Summary:
Quality Platform supports a premium streaming service, offering live and on-demand TV and movies, with and without commercials, both in and outside the home. Operating at the intersection of entertainment and technology, Quality Platform consists of people who are passionate about redefining TV through innovation, unconventional thinking, and embracing fun. As a team, we are able to touch a wide stack of technologies and come up with many tooling solutions to many of the problems the Quality organization might face. By doing so, you will never be bored and siloed into one project, where you have the ability to move to other projects and increase your skillset on all sorts of different projects.
Responsibilities:
Design, architect and implement across services and clients for large scope testing frameworks
Ownership of daily engineering work; ideate, review design, build, code-review, test, launch,
Monitor and maintain
Actively mentor other engineers
Treat quality as a habit and enforce software engineering best practices and appropriate design patterns
Basic Qualifications:
2+ year of relevant software engineering experience
Proficiency in Java or Python
Experience using Automation Testing Framework (such as Selenium, Appium, etc…)
Does extremely well with communication, mentorship and collaboration skills.
Strong teamwork ethic and strive for perfection
Preferred Qualifications:
5+ years of relevant software engineering experience or software automation experience
Proficient in cloud infrastructure such as AWS, Spinnaker or Jenkins, and Kubernetes
Strong system design and analytical skills
CI/CD experience/knowledge
Preferred Education
Bachelor’s in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Management Information Systems or related field.
